headline.print_headline: Time Running Out for Teams Clinging to Playoff Hopes
headline.main: Time Running Out for Teams Clinging to Playoff Hopes

docs.snippet: Just nine of the 16 playoff spots in the National Basketball Association (NBA) remain up for grabs after the Chicago Bulls, Los Angeles Clippers and Toronto Raptors secured their places in the postseason over the weekend....
docs.lead_paragraph: Just nine of the 16 playoff spots in the National Basketball Association (NBA) remain up for grabs after the Chicago Bulls, Los Angeles Clippers and Toronto Raptors secured their places in the postseason over the weekend.

headline.print_headline: Screening: Made Nervous by the Doctor

docs.snippet: A large review of studies finds that there is truth to the “white coat effect” when it comes to taking a patient’s blood pressure....
docs.abstract: A large review of studies finds that there is truth to the “white coat effect” when it comes to taking a patient’s blood pressure.

headline.print_headline: White House: Kerry to Speak to Lavrov Again About Ukraine
headline.main: White House: Kerry to Speak to Lavrov Again About Ukraine

docs.snippet: The White House said on Monday that Secretary of State John Kerry and Russian Foreign Minister Sergei Lavrov had agreed to speak again about ways to resolve the crisis in Ukraine but that no date for such a conversation had been set....
docs.lead_paragraph: The White House said on Monday that Secretary of State John Kerry and Russian Foreign Minister Sergei Lavrov had agreed to speak again about ways to resolve the crisis in Ukraine but that no date for such a conversation had been set.

headline.print_headline: White House Sees Obamacare Sign-Ups 'Substantially Larger' Than Six Million
headline.main: White House Sees Obamacare Sign-Ups 'Substantially Larger' Than Six Million

docs.snippet: The White House said on Monday that it expects final enrollment numbers for private health care insurance under Obamacare in 2014 to be "substantially larger" than 6 million after a busy final weekend of in-person and online signups....
docs.lead_paragraph: The White House said on Monday that it expects final enrollment numbers for private health care insurance under Obamacare in 2014 to be "substantially larger" than 6 million after a busy final weekend of in-person and online signups.

headline.print_headline: Atletico Will Look to Impose Own Style on Barca-Simeone
headline.main: Atletico Will Look to Impose Own Style on Barca-Simeone

docs.snippet: Atletico Madrid coach Diego Simeone again expects a clash of football styles when his side visit Barcelona in the quarter-finals of the Champions League on Tuesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Atletico Madrid coach Diego Simeone again expects a clash of football styles when his side visit Barcelona in the quarter-finals of the Champions League on Tuesday.

headline.print_headline: U.S. Soda Sales Decline Worsened in 2013: Beverage Digest
headline.main: U.S. Soda Sales Decline Worsened in 2013: Beverage Digest

docs.snippet: The decline in U.S. sales of carbonated soft drinks accelerated in 2013, according to a leading beverage industry newsletter....
docs.lead_paragraph: The decline in U.S. sales of carbonated soft drinks accelerated in 2013, according to a leading beverage industry newsletter.

headline.print_headline: Guardiola Fears United's Best Two Displays of the Season
headline.main: Guardiola Fears United's Best Two Displays of the Season

docs.snippet: Manchester United remain very dangerous opponents despite their struggles domestically as they focus their efforts on Europe, Bayern Munich coach Pep Guardiola said on the eve of their Champions League quarter-final first leg....
docs.lead_paragraph: Manchester United remain very dangerous opponents despite their struggles domestically as they focus their efforts on Europe, Bayern Munich coach Pep Guardiola said on the eve of their Champions League quarter-final first leg.

headline.print_headline: Soda Sales in US Decline at Faster Pace
headline.main: Soda Sales in US Decline at Faster Pace

docs.snippet: Americans cut back on soda at an accelerated pace last year, extending a slow retreat from the category that began nearly a decade ago....
docs.lead_paragraph: Americans cut back on soda at an accelerated pace last year, extending a slow retreat from the category that began nearly a decade ago.

docs.snippet: Sea Launch AG has postponed the planned April 15 launch of a communications satellite for France-based Eutelsat because of damage that occurred during movement of the integrated launch vehicle at the company's homeport in Long Beach, Calif....
docs.lead_paragraph: Sea Launch AG has postponed the planned April 15 launch of a communications satellite for France-based Eutelsat because of damage that occurred during movement of the integrated launch vehicle at the company's homeport in Long Beach, Calif.
